wt.servlet

Interface ContextMonitorMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SelfEmailingMBean
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextMonitor

    public interface ContextMonitorMBean
extends SelfEmailingMBean
    Monitors a web application context

    Supported API: true

    Extendable: true
